price: Dhugumatti, Qur’aanni kun (karaa) ishee irra (haqaafi) qajeeltuu taatetti qajeelcha. Mu’uminoota warra gaggaarii hojjatan dhugumatti mindaan guddaan isaaniif jiraachuudhaan gammachiisa.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ يَهۡدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقۡوَمُ وَيُبَشِّرُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā al-qur'āna yahdī lillatī hiya aqwamu wayubashiru al-mu'minīna alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran kabīran
